mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.create_time createTime, r.name name, r.url, r.description, r.category_id categoryId FROM ums_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rrr ON arr.role_id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource r ON r.id = rrr.resource_id LEFT JOIN ums_admin a ON arr.admin_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{adminId} AND r.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.id
